transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ek minute likh sir, ye abhi chal raha hu.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir, good morning.
Customer: Ji, good morning, boliye na.
Executive: Abhi aapko kya dikkat aa rahi hai, kal aap kuch bata rahe the na message pe.
Customer: Sir, wahi dikkat aa raha hai, lead hi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Kal aapne kuch lead purchase to kari thi teen char.
Customer: Ji, char panch lead purchase kiya par sir wahi jo main main lead hai na.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Matlab ye lead maine kaise purchase kiya sir, dekho koi koi matlab wo jo kaam ka bhi nahi tha, waise bhi purchase kar liya, kyuki ye toner cartridge wagera ka rehta hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To main bola aata hai to isiliye toner cartridge ink cartridge ka uthaya.
Executive: Haan, toner aur ink cartridge ka pada to hai lead ek char ghante pehle aaya hua hai Chhattisgarh se, ek aapka HP.
Customer: Wo isme aur isme notification bhi nahi aa raha hai, kuch aisa aa hi nahi raha hai, aayega to malum padega.
Executive: Notification on kar rakha hai na aapne setting mein.
Customer: Ji, on kar rakha hai.
Executive: Haan to aana chahiye, waise by lead ka notification to kafi time se band hai, aap bata rahe ho notification aata hai, kab aapne dekha tha notification aate hue.
Customer: Haan, aa raha hai hamare wo old wale jo sab inquiry ka aata hai, I think by lead ka to nahi aata notification.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, by lead ka message aa raha hai, main dikha raha hu aapko mere old account se.
Customer: Abhi bhi abhi bhi message aa raha hai, by lead aata hai na to ek aawaz aata hai.
Executive: Dikhata hu, ek second rukiye.
Customer: Ji sir.

Executive: On kar rakha hai to aana chahiye. Hum log ko jankari nahi hai.
Customer: Ek minute aap mere ko batao ki kidhar pe on kaise setting mein IndiaMART app se app mein setting ya mobile app ki setting.
Executive: Haan haan haan, wahi setting mein aap jaoge notification setting karke option.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ek minute chal raha hu sir.
Customer: Notification on hoga to aayega.
Customer: IndiaMART setting.
Customer: Aa gaya.
Executive: Notification setting aa raha hoga.
Customer: Ye alert notification notification setting mein by lead wagera email aur SMS dono on hai.
Executive: Haan, thik hai.
Customer: Aur latest traders mein bhi dono on hai, by lead post purchase mein dono on hai aur trade post purchase mein email mein bhi on hai.
Executive: Actually kya hai main batata hu, on to hai hi hai, jaise ab koi bulk lead aayi, thik hai, panch logo ne purchase kar liya.
Customer: Aur ek ye ki by lead night notification.
Executive: Haan ye click kariye by lead notification, ye to main hai.
Customer: Wo hi off tha sir.
Executive: Haan, tabhi to nahi aa raha hai, kyuki notification to aata hai aisa nahi hai, agar aap on karke rakhoge to aayega.
Customer: Aur fast lead mein hai, by lead business inquiry bhi on hai.
Executive: Haan haan sab sab on karke rakhiye, sara sara sara on karke rakhiye, main dekh pa raha hu, abhi toner cartridge ka khub sara lead aaya tha, I think aap online nahi the purchase nahi kar paye, 12 minute pehle aaya tha, 33 minute pehle aaya tha, 44 minute pehle aaya tha aur teen ghante pehle aaya tha, che se saat lead aa chuki hai morning se, fast lead mein dikh raha hai, fast lead mein aap jaake dekho.
Customer: By lead wale page by lead wale page pe jayenge, fast lead karke option hai right side mein.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Toner ka aaya hua hai pehle abhi 13 minute pehle.
Executive: Haan haan wahi na toner cartridge ka aaya tha 34 minute pehle.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul HP toner cartridge ka 20 piece ka aaya tha 45 minute pehle.
Executive: Haan are lead aa raha hai, lead mein koi dikkat hi nahi hai, fast lead mein dikh raha hai, log purchase kar rahe hai.
Customer: Usme kyu nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Kisme nahi dikh raha hai.
Customer: Ye recent mein sir.
Executive: Haan to recent wale mein refresh aap karte rahoge wahi aake guzarta hai, aisa nahi hai, jo pehle panch minute.
Customer: Chalu rehta hai sir, 10 10 second wale chalu rehta hai.
Executive: Aap ye karoge recent page pe aa hi nahi raha hai, ye bol rahe ho aap.
Customer: Ji sir. Recent recent page ke bina kaise thodi piche chala jayega, fast lead mein wahi lead dikhti hai jo purchase ho chuki hoti hai, ab wo aapke net ke speed pe depend karta hai, aap kaise refresh kar rahe ho usme matter karta hai.
Customer: Nahi sir recent mein yaar.
Executive: Micro micro second micro micro second mein lead sold out ho jati hai, kyuki panch log jaise hi touch karenge turant ud jayega.
Customer: Haan wo to malum hai sir.
Executive: Wahi hai usme wo hum bhi kuch nahi kar sakte usme.
Customer: Aur inquiry wagera kuch nahi aaya yaar abhi se.
Executive: Haan inquiry to dhire dhire aayega na, account new hai na abhi host hua hai, abhi aap by lead consume karte jao fir badhega dhire dhire.
Customer: Inquiry call wagera chalu karo na to main hamara wahi kam hai inquiry aur call se.
Executive: Inquiry aapka jo product hai Gandhidham Gujarat waha koi buyer jayega, aapka product dekhega then call kar payega, Gandhidham mein aapka dikh raha hai, diamond.
Customer: Gandhidham mein dikh raha hai aur ye city wagera kidhar se mere computer mein khula hai to mere ko city wagera dekhna hai mera city kaun sa kaun sa hai to main wo kidhar se dekh paunga.
Executive: City mein thodi aap dekhoge aap keval Gandhidham mein dekhoge maximizer chala rahe ho na aap catalog chala rahe ho aap to keval Gandhidham mein dekhoge na alag city mein thodi aap dekhoge.
Customer: Matlab alag city mein kya.
Executive: Agar koi HP toner cartridge Gandhidham mein search karega to aapki company aayegi, right.
Customer: To matlab dusri jagah meri nahi dikh sakte kya bahar.
Executive: Delhi Mumbai mein thodi na dikhegi wo to keval aapke GST office pe dikhegi na jaha pe aapne catalog host karaya hua hai, keval aapke GST address pe dikhega na maximizer chal raha hai.
Customer: To star mein sab jagah dikhta hai.
Executive: Haan star aur leader mein dikhta hai, wo city listing hota hai wo alag se karana padta hai, ki 10 city ka lo all India ka lo wo aapke upar depend karta hai, ye aapka catalog hai, koi bhi Gandhidham mein search karega chahe MDC chalae TrustSeal chalae maximizer chalae aapka Gandhidham.
Customer: Hamara by lead kaun si city ka chahiye waisa se bechta hai na.
Executive: By lead to sabke liye same milta hai aap kahin se bhi purchase karo, inquiry ka bata raha hu main ki google pe agar jaake koi search karega HP toner cartridge Gandhidham ke page pe aapka account dikhega aur kahin nahi dikhega Delhi Mumbai ya kahin pe bhi.
Customer: Aur ye performance catalog mein ye 14 item hai wo kya rahega.
Executive: Performance 14 item matlab.
Customer: Ye matlab dekho performance ye maine setting mein gaya.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Setting mein se by lead performance mein gaya.
Executive: Hmm thik hai. Uske uske niche perfect location likha hua hai.
Executive: Haan wo aapka by lead consumption pe dikhata hai, aap by lead kaha kaha se purchase kar rahe ho wo baad mein update ho jayega city.
Customer: Okay aur ye not performance location matlab bhi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Haan jaha jaha se jaha se aapko lead nahi purchase karni hai wo aap add kar sakte ho yaha pe waha ka lead nahi.
Customer: Okay okay aur ye jo upar rehta hai wo teen hai wo on the city aur aur manjuri wo wo by lead preference ka tab hai, aap by lead jaha jaha se use karoge wo update hota rehta hai hafte 10 din ke hisab se.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Jaha jis jis category ka use karoge jis shahar ka use karoge wo weekly basis pe update hota hai abhi ek hafta nahi hua hai na purchase ki isliye city nahi dikha raha hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Haan baki Gandhidham mein hi dekhoge aap Gandhidham mein koi buyer aayega to hi inquiry kar payega, city change ke liye city listing leni padti hai usme thodi na alag se dikhega.
Customer: Thik hai sir thik hai ji.
Executive: Aur recent wale tab pe aap refresh karte rahiye lead milega.
Customer: Aur ye isme relevance mein bhi nahi dikh raha hai by lead only recent mein hi dikh raha tha.
Executive: Haan to main uska reason batata hu na jab ek baat aap batao ki recent wale tab pe nahi aa pa raha hai fast lead mein chala ja raha hai to relevance mein kaise bachega lead, itna daba ke consumption ho raha hai, kaha se lead bachega aap khud hi socho.
Customer: Competition jyada hai na product mein.
Executive: Hmm. Relevant mein kuch leads aa rahi hai foreign ki aa rahi hai, domestic ki nahi aa rahi hai kyuki domestic ki bachi hi nahi hai sari sold ho chuki hai isme nahi dikha raha hai.
Customer: Catalog wagera catalog view wagera mein abhi to kuch nahi hai abhi.
Executive: Abhi inquiry nahi aa raha hai catalog view kaha aayega abhi to mahina bhar lagega account boost hone mein jaise jaise aap consumption karoge then account boost hoga.
Executive: Consumption jyada karne ka try kare ki by lead aap jyada se jyada consume kar pao then you can get the direct inquiries.
Customer: Wahi isiliye main by lead kal maine nahi sir main sir usme main panch lead uthaya na usme se mere ko ek hi kaam ka laga ab main baki char aise hi tha to bhi maine utha liya.
Executive: Haan waisi hi waisi hi rehta hai, sari by lead mein aapko aisa nahi ki sab mein relevancy milegi, ek do by lead mana bhi matlab customer mana bhi karenge, baad mein dekhunga har type ke buyer hote hai na.
Customer: Nahi nahi har buyer ke nahi usme dekho main utha tha na to main uthane jaunga to wo main bhi utha bhi nahi sakta kyuki wo kaam ka hi nahi hai sir.
Executive: Haan nahi to usko aap not relevant kar sakte ho, delete pe click karke usme aap dal do ki I do not deal in this product aisa karke dal do.
Customer: Wo maine kyuki main bola uthata hu to jyada by lead thoda by lead ka thoda bade to aisa main laga isiliye maine thoda thoda karke utha liya main bola panch lead aaj uthata hu isiliye.
Executive: Nahi nahi usme active rahiye jyada se jyada lead purchase kare jo kaam ka nahi hai usko aap not relevant kariye koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Thik hai aur ye notification abhi chalu ho gaya na.
Executive: Haan haan wo ab sara on karke rakhiye aayega kyuki on rehta hai to aata hai aisa koi dikkat nahi hai lekin agar agar agar lead koi sold ho jayegi tab notification nahi hai agar jab panch log purchase hi kar lenge tab notification kyu aayega ye bhi to aap dekho.
Customer: To aap aap aapka main focus ye hai ki recent wale page pe aap refresh karte raho online reh ke jitna ho sake.
Customer: Thik hai.

Executive: Baki ye aapka concern main close kar de raha hu, ek feedback mil jayega usko satisfied mark kar dijiyega.
Customer: Kaun sa?
Executive: Aapke paas ek feedback mil jayega usko satisfied mark kar dijiyega aapke email pe jayega.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads and notifications.

- Some purchased buyleads were irrelevant.

- Wants to know how to view city-wise data.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to enable buylead notifications.

- Explained fast lead shows purchased leads.

- Clarified city-wise data is limited to Gandhidham.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to refresh recent tab for leads.

- Customer to mark feedback as satisfied.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notifications, catalog, location, performance
